Title: Gran Torino
Writer: Nick Schenk (screenplay), Dave Johannson (story), Nick Schenk (story)
Actors: Clint Eastwood, Christopher Carley, Bee Vang, Ahney Her
Plot: Disgruntled Korean War veteran Walt Kowalski (Clint Eastwood) sets out to reform his neighbor, Thao Lor (Bee Vang), a Hmong teenager who tried to steal Kowalski's prized possession: a 1972 Gran Torino.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 20 wins & 17 nominations.
